page.title: 03Martock Recreation field
page.content: Many changes have taken place at Martock Recreation field recently. A special hall for{cubs, scouts, {brownies and girl guides}has been built. People had to raise a lot of money and put in a lot of effort to build the hall. There is a{BMX bicycle track}in Martock. The BMX track is made of mounds of earth. Lots of children take their BMXs down on the track for fun. Two years ago there were two {tennis courts}built. Much money was raised by grants and donations. The tennis club entered two mixed teams in the Yeovil league for the first time this year. Last year a{cricket club was formed and they raised money for an artifcial all weather pitch. Last year they played friendly matches but this year they have entered 3 different leagues.
